Control Name: 7.3 Ensure that 'Unattached disks' are encrypted with CMK
Control Statement: Ensure that unattached disks in a subscription are encrypted with a Customer Managed Key (CMK).

control_attributes.description: Ensure that unattached disks in a subscription are encrypted with a Customer Managed Key (CMK).
